DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza lista con productos unicos. Los mismos se tienen controlados para mantener bien los valores por el atributo Compania. */
insert into Consultas_DW.dbo.NOTIFICACION_Productos_Facturacion select distinct id_producto from DW_SALUD.dbo.AUX_H_CIRCUITO_FACTURACION where id_producto not in (select distinct id_producto from Consultas_DW.dbo.NOTIFICACION_Productos_Facturacion)

properties.property:
SELECT W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe_Facturado, W_V550_CCCT as Signo, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then 12 else 11 end) as Id_marca_facturado, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, C.W_V550_NCOM as nro_comprobante, C.W_V550_TCOM as id_tipo_comprobante, C.W_V550_TALO as nro_talonario, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania , SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo
FROM AMSPROVD.V550FDECAB C
JOIN AMSPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM
WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('X70','X71','F46','F48','F50','F41','C41','C41V','F34')

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.name: AccessMode

properties.property:
SELECT W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe_Facturado, W_V550_CCCT as Signo, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then 12 else 11 end) as Id_marca_facturado, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, C.W_V550_NCOM as nro_comprobante, C.W_V550_TCOM as id_tipo_comprobante, C.W_V550_TALO as nro_talonario, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania , SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo
FROM OSPPROVD.V550FDECAB C
JOIN OSPPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM
WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('X70','X71','F46','F48','F50','F41','C41','C41V','F34')

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

SELECT W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe_Facturado, W_V550_CCCT as Signo, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then 12 else 11 end) as Id_marca_facturado, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, C.W_V550_NCOM as nro_comprobante, C.W_V550_TCOM as id_tipo_comprobante, C.W_V550_TALO as nro_talonario, (CASE when (W_V550_PRDU = 43 or W_V550_PRDU = 44 or W_V550_PRDU = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania , SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo
FROM SMPPROVD.V550FDECAB C
JOIN SMPPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM
WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('X70','X71','F46','F48','F50','F41','C41','C41V','F34')

properties.property:
SELECT W_V550_FREC AS Fecha_Recepcion, W_V550CU AS Nro_Cursograma, W_V550_NPRO AS Id_Acreedor, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then W_V551_IMPO * (-1) else W_V551_IMPO end) AS Importe_Facturado, W_V550_CCCT as Signo, (CASE when W_V550_CCCT = 'D' then 12 else 11 end) as Id_marca_facturado, 'X' as nro_factura_acree, W_V550_PRDU as id_producto, C.W_V550_NCOM as nro_comprobante, C.W_V550_TCOM as id_tipo_comprobante, C.W_V550_TALO as nro_talonario, 2 as id_compania, SUBSTRING(W_V550_FREC, 1, 6) as id_periodo
FROM STFPROVD.V550FDECAB C
JOIN STFPROVD.V551FDEVTO D on C.W_V550_TALO = D.W_V551_TALO and C.W_V550_TCOM = D.W_V551_TCOM and C.W_V550_NCOM = D.W_V551_NCOM
WHERE W_V550_FREC >= ? and W_V550_FREC < ? and C.W_V550_TCOM in ('X70','X71','F46','F48','F50','F41','C41','C41V','F34')

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

properties.property:
SELECT CUC_FRE as Fecha_Recepcion, CUC_NUM as Nro_Cursograma, CUC_ACC as Id_Acreedor, SUM(CUC_ITF) as Importe_Facturado, 'I' as Signo, 1 as Id_marca_facturado, CUC_FAC as nro_factura_acree, SRV_COD as id_producto , SUBSTRING(CUC_FRE, 1, 6) as id_periodo, (CASE when (SRV_COD = 43 or SRV_COD = 44 or SRV_COD = 46) then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania
, 0 as nro_comprobante, 'X' as id_tipo_comprobante, 0 as talonario
FROM DESARROLLO.CUP004 C
JOIN SMPDATD.M124FPROV D on C.CUC_ACC = D.W_PV_NPRO
WHERE ECA_COD in ('O') and CUC_FRE >= ? and CUC_FRE < ? and CUCREI <> 'R' and (SRV_COD <> 0 and SRV_COD <> 18)
GROUP BY CUC_FRE, CUC_NUM, CUC_ACC, CUC_FAC, SRV_COD

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
------ Periodo
----select 201806 as Periodo
select max(id_periodo) as Periodo from D_PERIODO where vigente_consumo = 1

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
------ Periodo Desde
----select '20180601' as Periodo_Desde
select top 1 CAST((dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(id_fecha))as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Desde from D_FECHA F JOIN D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
----select '20180701' as Periodo_Hasta
select top 1 CAST(dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(DATEADD(month,1,id_fecha)) as CHAR(6))+'01' as Periodo_Hasta from D_FECHA F JOIN D_PERIODO P on dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(F.id_fecha) = P.id_periodo where vigente_consumo = 1 order by id_fecha desc
